Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Jones considers the match against England important
Jones shared that every time he puts on a US jersey, he wants to win the game, regardless of who they're playing against
Jones stated that the USA will go all out against England to ensure a positive end to their fairytale campaign

With a nine-wicket loss to the West Indies on June 21, USA have no points to their name as of yet
In Group 2 of the Super Eights, South Africa sit at the top of the table with wins against England and USA, having registered four points
West Indies and England occupy the second and third spots respectively, with two points each
The co-hosts will be taking on England in their final Super Eights fixture on June 23, 2024, at the Kensington Oval Stadium in Barbados, determined to conclude their season on a positive note
